text: Abantu bose bari mw’idini rimwe, hanyuma Imana ibarungikira intumwa zayo zibashikiriza ubutumwa bwiza kuko bajejwe gutuza, hamwe n’ivyo vyose yarabamanuriye ibitabu bijanye n’ukuri kugira ngo bibacire imanza ziri hagati y’abantu muvyo batumvikanye ko, kandi ntibumvikanye kuri ivyo atari kuri barya bahawe ivyo bitabu bamaze gushikirwa n’ivyemezo biri k’umugaragaro kubera inzigo n’inzikira zari hagati yabo, ninaho Imana yarongoye abayemeye kugira k’ukuri kuri birya batumvikanyeko kw’itegeko ry’Imana, nayo Imana irongora uwo yishakiye kuja munzira igororotse
